hero.title: Our Initiatives & Programs
hero.subtitle: Transforming Lives Together
hero.description: Join us in making a lasting impact through sustainable development and community empowerment projects across the globe.

initiatives.title: Clean Water Initiative
initiatives.description: Providing access to clean and safe drinking water in underserved communities.

initiatives.title: Education Support Program
initiatives.description: Supporting quality education through scholarships and infrastructure development.

initiatives.title: Healthcare Access Program
initiatives.description: Improving healthcare access through mobile clinics and medical support.

initiatives.title: Community Development
initiatives.description: Empowering communities through sustainable development projects.

initiatives.title: Mosque Construction
initiatives.description: Building and maintaining mosques as centers of community life.

initiatives.title: Food Security Program
initiatives.description: Ensuring food security through distribution and sustainable agriculture.

initiatives.title: Community Libraries
initiatives.description: Establishing libraries to promote literacy and lifelong learning.

initiatives.title: Orphan Support Program
initiatives.description: Providing comprehensive support for orphaned children.

initiatives.title: Strategic Partnerships
initiatives.description: Building partnerships for sustainable development impact.

testimonials.name: Ahmed Hassan
testimonials.quote: Thanks to the clean water project, our village now has access to safe drinking water. This has transformed our lives.

testimonials.name: Fatima Ali
testimonials.quote: The scholarship program helped me complete my education. I am now able to support my family and give back to my community.

testimonials.name: Dr. Yusuf Khan
testimonials.quote: The mobile clinic initiative has been instrumental in providing healthcare to remote communities. The impact is truly remarkable.

whatWeDo.title: Emergency Relief
whatWeDo.description: Providing immediate assistance to communities affected by conflicts and natural disasters.
whatWeDo.stats: 240,000+ people received emergency aid last year

whatWeDo.title: Sustainable Development
whatWeDo.description: Creating long-term solutions that empower communities to become self-sufficient.

whatWeDo.title: Child Welfare
whatWeDo.description: Supporting orphans and vulnerable children with education, healthcare, and protection.

campaigns.title: Empowering Poor Families
campaigns.description: Help families become self-sufficient through skills training and income generation projects.

campaigns.title: Giving Lives On
campaigns.description: Provide ongoing support to families affected by conflicts and natural disasters.

campaigns.title: Embrace the Blessings of Giving
campaigns.description: A chance to multiply your rewards by supporting our humanitarian initiatives.

campaigns.title: Rebuilding Hope
campaigns.description: Help rebuild communities devastated by natural disasters and conflict.

donationFields.name: Mosques

dailySadaqa.title: Daily Sadaqa Program
dailySadaqa.description: A special donation program that allows enrolled donors to automatically donate an agreed amount every day, to support a need every day, and enrich your days with a daily Sadaqah.
features: Automatically donate an amount of your choice daily
Earn continuous rewards through consistent giving

quickDonation.heading: Make a Donation Today
quickDonation.description: Your contribution can make a real difference in the lives of those in need. Choose how you want to help.

impactStatsSection.title: Making a Difference Together
impactStatsSection.subtitle: Through the generous support of our donors, we've been able to make a significant difference in communities around the world.

whatWeDoSection.title: What We Do
whatWeDoSection.subtitle: We work with local communities to implement sustainable solutions that address the root causes of poverty and vulnerability.

featuredInitiativesSection.title: Current Initiatives
featuredInitiativesSection.subtitle: Explore our range of humanitarian initiatives designed to create lasting positive change.

testimonialsSection.title: Transforming Lives
testimonialsSection.subtitle: Hear directly from those whose lives have been transformed through our initiatives.

campaignsSection.title: Join Our Active Campaigns
campaignsSection.subtitle: Support our ongoing campaigns and help us make an immediate difference in communities that need it most.

donationFieldsSection.title: Choose Your Impact Area
donationFieldsSection.subtitle: We help you start your own charitable project. Where or what you decide to support is totally up to you.

ctaSection.title: Join Us in Making a Difference
ctaSection.description: Your support can transform lives and communities. Together, we can create lasting positive change.
